function:
def modify_features(df_input) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    """
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    """
    Improved version of `modify_features_v0`.
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Distance and Right-Distance can help determine the side with more leverage.
    New Feature 1: distance_difference | distance_difference = abs(Left-Distance - Right-Distance)
    Thought 2: Combining weights and distances can give a more holistic view of the balance situation.
    New Feature 2: left_total | left_total = Left-Weight * Left-Distance
    New Feature 3: right_total | right_total = Right-Weight * Right-Distance
    """
    df_output = df_input.copy()
    
    # Calculate absolute difference between Left-Distance and Right-Distance
    df_output['distance_difference'] = abs(df_output['Left-Distance'] - df_output['Right-Distance'])
    
    # Calculate total on the left side and total on the right side
    df_output['left_total'] = df_output['Left-Weight'] * df_output['Left-Distance']
    df_output['right_total'] = df_output['Right-Weight'] * df_output['Right-Distance']
    
    return df_output
